name: Katie J Coombs
text: Consistently great pizza especially the pan pizza. Really good service and friendly employees. Great family atmosphere too.

name: Hadassah Cronin
text: I order from Pizza Hut a lot because they have gluten free pizza that I actually like! The pizza here is great and I have never had a bad experience. This Pizza Hut is kind of weird about delivery sometimes though, but they'll tell you when you order if they're doing it.

name: Deb Clark
text: Favorite of my nephew's. He had a coupon from school for reading bioks, and he loves that. Had the buffet, worked out great. Only complaint that it was COLD to sit and eat..just wanted to leave.

name: M. D.
text: I have ordered from pizza hut in the past, and they're usually FANTASTIC, and the food is great. But this is not my experience at this location. I ordered a pizza and breadsticks via their online website. I live in an apartment and must go â€¦More

name: Jim Wood
text: In 1958, long before the rise of artisan pizza, Dan and Frank had a dream to bring Italian American cuisine to the masses. With this long history of preparing pizza, with ingredients, it is no wonder why the Hut continues to this day as a â€¦More

name: sphman01
text: The staff is not able to handle guests in excese of 10 people on their floor. They had to be made aware that we even exsisted after 15 minutes of sitting at a table with no drinks or service. Then there was another party that came in after â€¦More

name: Judy Delano
text: Delicious! Not a long wait. Love it!

name: Mike Botto
text: Called to see if they deliver. I gave them my address which was in Fayetteville on the border of Dewitt and Fayetteville, and they said "No. We're in Dewitt." and then they just hung up the phone. Good way to get business. Didn't even stay on to see if I was willing to come in and pick it up.

name: Tom Jaquay
text: Place was disgusting, waitress told us 1 trip to salad bar, was told when paying it was unlimited. Had to ask to have nasty salad swapped. (rotting/wilted). Then they give us the wrong check. (More expensive of course) Waitress was pretty rude too. Will never visit this location again. EVER

name: man hands
text: Very pleased with how well Todd and Beth did with our party of over 30 people last night for our kids on our bus. They were very pleasant and accomodating in the midst of mass confusion with our kids. The food was great, the service â€¦More

name: Rafael Alvarez
text: This is the worse customer service I have ever dealt with at any Pizza Hut. I've given than a number of chances with us as a customer and this will be the last time. Placed our order online and it didn't show up. When I tried to call the â€¦More

name: kelvin jones
text: Loved pizza hut. Mad they closed down

name: Shauna Jane Silvester
text: Absolutely horrible customer and food service! Had a delivery of over $50 and it took 1 hour and 15 minutes for us to receive or cold pizza and wings to our hotel room. Knowing that we were in a hotel room, they did not accommodate us with â€¦More

name: Mike Saltzman
text: Open good hours. Food tastes like it's supposed to (like EVERY pizza hut Ive ever been to). Staff is always friendly and accommodating when Im in there. It def smells slightly off inside, but the place looks clean and I just think that's a â€¦More

name: Leanna Butts
text: This is crazy!!!!! Wanted Pizza for work, placed the order around 1:20 pm and when get to the page that tells you when the pizza will be delivered. Its tells me that it will not be delivered until 8 tonight, That was 7 hours from the time â€¦More

name: Noble Notions
text: This is what you call pizza??Pizza taste old and dough is way too soft.do you guys check dates on your food?

name: Stefanie Latimore
text: The food was good..but hey it is Pizza Hut so that was expected. Table service was ok, but the place is very out dated. They didnt have many fountain drinks mine came in a bottle with a cup of ice on the side. They don't come refill drinks either you get a plastic pitcher with juice in it , so you can refill yourself.

name: Jessica Lewis
text: Ordered a pizza online. I checked over all the info before submitting the order and receiving the CC confirmation number. I called an hour after the pizza was suppose to be delivered (almost 2 hours after ordering) and was told by the dumb â€¦More

name: Stephanie Andrews
text: Fast service,pizza was good. Low price deals

name: justin curtis
text: They dont answer the phone to take your order.. the worst area for pizza hut ive ever been to. Get a better manager

name: Mike Shay
text: Decent pizza usually not crowded great service

name: Sherie Chrysler
text: Always a pleasure experience to stop by prior to rush hrs <3

name: Tony Fuda
text: Not a big Pizza Hut fan, but this Pizza Hut was particularly good!

text: one of the only huts with a lunch buffet.

text: Fast if your in a hurry,great variety

text: Dey Had No Gawic Wangs, Bruce Jenner wad ar waitrs. 10/10-IGN

name: Dan
text: Tried to order online for delivery, and was told that they weren't doing delivery anymore for that night, even though they were open for at least another two hours. I don't have a car, so carryout is impossible.

name: Sophia Brown
text: My nephew (age 4) loves the place, went there for our lunch date.

name: Jared Georgi
text: Our server attended to my family's needs  well.  The food was good as well.

name: Jakob Fitts
text: Tried calling these fools numerous times but they never answer the phone, ended up driving to them & when asked about the phone they had no answer..... I use to work @ pizza hut so I know what's expected, worst store I've ever been to

name: Frank Aliacquia
text: Pizza hut TV shows any pizza 10.00 any size and topping  when u call they tell u there store don't do that deal.....woow never go back there again ..go to private piza shop keep the little guy alive ..
